reference.scope: VARIANTS [LARGE SCALE ANALYSIS] GLU-30; GLY-49; SER-49; PRO-212; PHE-238; GLN-260; VAL-474; GLY-558; THR-569; PRO-599 AND LEU-714

comment.text: May play a role in spermatogenesis or folliculogenesis (By similarity). Binds hyperacetylated chromatin and plays a role in the regulation of transcription, probably by chromatin remodeling. Regulates transcription of the CCND1 gene. Plays a role in nucleosome assembly.
Homodimer. Interacts with E2F1 and with histone H4 acetylated at 'Lys-13'.
(Microbial infection) Interacts with herpes virus 8 protein LANA1.
One bromodomain is sufficient for a partial interaction with histone H4 acetylated at 'Lys-13'.

property.value: Expressed in testis and 233 other tissues
P:regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

feature.description: In a glioblastoma multiforme sample; somatic mutation.
In a gastric adenocarcinoma sample; somatic mutation.
In a glioblastoma multiforme sample; somatic mutation.
Partial loss of homodimerization; when associated with A-182.
Partial loss of homodimerization; when associated with A-154.
